text: a nightmare, also known as a bad dream,[1] is an unpleasant dream that can cause a strong emotional response from the mind, typically fear but also despair, anxiety or great sadness. the dream may contain situations of discomfort, psychological or physical terror, or panic. after a nightmare, a person will often awaken in a state of distress and may be unable to return to sleep for a short period of time.[2] recurrent nightmares may require medical help, as they can interfere with sleeping patterns and cause insomnia.
